LanguageData.AA_AchievementGallatross.label: Thrumbos Schmrumbos
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBlackChitin.label: Black is the New Black
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBlackChitin.description: Craft a Black Insect Chitin duster. Stylish.
LanguageData.AA_AchievementAerofleet.label: Framerate? What Framerate?
LanguageData.AA_AchievementAerofleet.description: Tame an Aerofleet, let it reproduce till you have 100. Then detonate them. Ok, that is optional, but come on.
LanguageData.AA_AchievementPsionicLove.label: Psionic Love
LanguageData.AA_AchievementPsionicLove.description: Get psionically nuzzled by an Animus Vox.
LanguageData.AA_AchievementStalker.label: Hide and Seek
LanguageData.AA_AchievementStalker.description: Have an Arctic Lion stalk your colonists
LanguageData.AA_AchievementAtispec.label: The Longest Wait
LanguageData.AA_AchievementAtispec.description: Nurture an Atispec Larva into a mighty Atispec
LanguageData.AA_AchievementArachnophobia.label: Arachnophobia
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBlackHive.label: Not the Mechanoids You Are Looking For
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBlackHiveExterminator.desc: Kill 150 Black Hive Insectoids. That will teach them.
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBlackHiveJelly.label: It's My Food Now
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBlackHiveJelly.description: Get at least 250 Black Insect Jelly from Black Hive invasions
LanguageData.AA_AchievementSkySteel.label: It Came From Outer Space
LanguageData.AA_AchievementSkySteel.description: Mine or trade at least 200 Sky Steel
LanguageData.AA_AchievementAcid.label: This is the Vat of Acid Episode
LanguageData.AA_AchievementAcid.description: Have a colonist or animal be affected by an acid burn
LanguageData.AA_AchievementToxic.label: The Toxicity of My Colony
LanguageData.AA_AchievementToxic.description: Have a colonist or animal be affected by a toxic buildup that won't rot their body
LanguageData.AA_AchievementNocturnal.label: By a Moonlight Shadow
LanguageData.AA_AchievementNocturnal.description: Have a nocturnal or crepuscular animal
LanguageData.AA_AchievementNoChocobo.label: Not a Chocobo
LanguageData.AA_AchievementNoChocobo.description: Acquire any kind of Ave and install Giddy-Up if you haven't
LanguageData.AA_AchievementMinerBoys.label: Miner Boys
LanguageData.AA_AchievementMinerBoys.description: Tame a troupe of 4 Groundrunners to mine for you
LanguageData.AA_AchievementMuffaloPlus.label: Muffalo++
LanguageData.AA_AchievementMuffaloPlus.description: Acquire a Gigantelope with Legendary carry capacity
LanguageData.AA_AchievementMutantHand.label: Did It Blink at Me?
LanguageData.AA_AchievementMutantHand.description: Install a mutant arm, acquired from a Teratogenic Originator
LanguageData.AA_AchievementGreg.label: I Will Call It "Greg"
LanguageData.AA_AchievementDiscoInferno.label: Disco Inferno
LanguageData.AA_AchievementDiscoInferno.description: Attack any of the "Pod" variants with enough fire to cause him permanent burn damage
LanguageData.AA_AchievementGreenestEnergy.label: Greenest Energy
LanguageData.AA_AchievementGreenestEnergy.description: Tame a TetraSlug and make it recharge your batteries
LanguageData.AA_AchievementNoSherpaNeeded.label: No Sherpa Needed
LanguageData.AA_AchievementNoSherpaNeeded.description: Kill a gargantuan Summit Crab before it pulverizes your whole colony
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBuzzingArmy.label: Buzzing Army
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBuzzingArmy.description: Tame a Bumbledrone Queen and make her create 20 Bumbledrones.
LanguageData.AA_AchievementGourmelette.label: Gourmelette
LanguageData.AA_AchievementGourmelette.description: Use an expensive Nightling Egg to create a Lavish Meal
LanguageData.AA_AchievementJellyfishSalad.label: Jellyfish salad
LanguageData.AA_AchievementJellyfishSalad.description: Make a Simple meal out of Aerofleet meat
LanguageData.AA_AchievementMechanoidSiege.label: Mechanoid Siege
LanguageData.AA_AchievementDealWithTheDevil.label: Deal With the Devil
LanguageData.AA_AchievementDealWithTheDevil.descripti: Have a colonist develop a bond with a Devilsheep. Don't expect it to be mutual.
LanguageData.AA_AchievementGoodestBoys.label: The Goodest Boys
LanguageData.AA_AchievementGoodestBoys.description: Assemble an strike team of a Ray Hound, a Razorjack and a Ripper Hound
LanguageData.AA_AchievementGoingVegan.label: Going Vegan... More or Less
LanguageData.AA_AchievementExtremeHauteCouture.label: Extreme Haute Couture
LanguageData.AA_AchievementExtremeHauteCouture.descri: Craft any item out of Gallatross Leather.
LanguageData.AA_AchievementResourceful.label: Resourceful
LanguageData.AA_AchievementResourceful.description: Harvest any exotic animal product that doesn't count as Milking or Shearing
LanguageData.AA_AchievementOmNomNom.label: Om Nom Nom
LanguageData.AA_AchievementOmNomNom.description: Tame an Helixien slug and make it feed on human corpses
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBetterNotWaitForIt.label: Better Not Wait For It
LanguageData.AA_AchievementBetterNotWaitForIt.descrip: Tame an Angel Moth and feed it some legendary quality clothing
LanguageData.AA_AchievementADifferentKindOfFarming.de: Tame a Sand Squid and make it fertilize some sand
LanguageData.AA_AchievementNoLight.label: Wanting for the Sun
LanguageData.AA_AchievementNoLight.description: Witness a plant creature dying due to lack of sunlight
